languages.text: {n}Логово, в котором вы оказались, полнится клубами дурманного дыма, а по стенам стелются живые тени. В центре всеобщего внимания расположился змееподобный ксенос. Он поглощен беседой с изможденной бледной друкари, на вас он не обращает внимания — как и никто здесь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Логово, в котором вы оказались, полнится клубами дурманного дыма, а по стенам стелятся живые тени. В центре всеобщего внимания расположился змееобразный ксенос с гуманоидным торсом и двумя парами рук. Ксенос поглощен беседой с изможденной бледной друкари, на вас он не обращает внимания — как и никто здесь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Логово, в котором вы оказались, полнится клубами дурманного дыма, а по стенам стелются живые тени. В центре всеобщего внимания расположился змееподобный ксенос. Он поглощен беседой с изможденной бледной друкари, на вас он не обращает внимания — как и никто здесь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. In the centre of everyone's attention is a snake-like xenos with a humanoid torso and two sets of arms. The xenos is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

{n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. In the centre of everyone's attention is a snake-like xenos with a humanoid torso and two sets of arms. The xenos is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

{n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos with a humanoid torso and two sets of arms. The xenos is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

{n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos with a humanoid torso and two sets of arms. The xenos is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

{n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

languages.text: {n}房间中充满了令人迷醉的烟雾，墙壁上倒映着拥有生命的影子。所有人目光的焦点是一只像蛇一样的异形。他正在与一位面色苍白、神色焦虑的黑暗灵族交谈，对你毫不在意。这里的其他人也同样对你毫不在意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}房间中充满了令人迷醉的烟雾，墙壁上倒映着拥有生命的影子。所有人目光的焦点是一只像蛇一样的异形。他正在与一位面色苍白、神色焦虑的黑暗灵族交谈，对你毫不在意。这里的其他人也同样对你毫不在意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El antro en el que te encuentras está lleno de humo y las paredes están cubiertas de sombras vivas. El centro de atención es un xenos con aspecto serpentino. Está hablando con una Drukhari pálida de aspecto agobiado y no te hace caso, como el resto de los presentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El antro en el que te encuentras está lleno de humo y las paredes están cubiertas de sombras vivas. El centro de atención es un xenos con aspecto serpentino. Está hablando con una Drukhari pálida de aspecto agobiado y no te hace caso, como el resto de los presentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}部屋の中は重い煙が充満しており、壁には生ける影が並んでいる。その中心には蛇のような見た目の異種族がいた。彼は青白く、忙しそうな顔をしたデュカーリと話しており、他の者と同様にこちらを気にする素振りは一切ない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}部屋の中は脳を刺激するような煙が充満しており、壁には生ける影が並んでいる。その中心には蛇のような見た目の異種族がいた。彼は青白く、忙しそうな顔をしたデュカーリと話しており、他の者と同様にこちらを気にする素振りは一切ない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Versteck, in dem du dich wiederfindest, ist voller Rauch, die Wände sind gesäumt von lebenden Schatten. Im Mittelpunkt der Aufmerksamkeit steht ein schlangenähnlicher Xenos. Er ist in ein Unterhaltung mit einer bleichen, gehetzt wirkenden Drukhari vertieft und beachtet dich gar nicht — genau wie jeder andere hier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Versteck, in dem du dich wiederfindest, ist voller Rauch, die Wände sind gesäumt von lebenden Schatten. Im Mittelpunkt der Aufmerksamkeit steht ein schlangenähnlicher Xenos. Er ist in ein Unterhaltung mit einer bleichen, gehetzt wirkenden Drukhari vertieft und beachtet dich gar nicht — genau wie jeder andere hier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'antre dans lequel vous vous trouvez est rempli d'une fumée capiteuse et des ombres vivantes dansent sur ses murs. Au centre de toutes les attentions, un xénos à l'apparence serpentine discute avec une Drukhari pâle aux traits tirés. Il ne vous porte pas le moindre intérêt, tout comme les autres personnes dans l'assistance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'antre dans lequel vous vous trouvez est rempli d'une fumée capiteuse et des ombres vivantes dansent sur ses murs. Au centre de toutes les attentions, un xénos à l'apparence serpentine discute avec une Drukhari pâle aux traits tirés. Il ne vous porte pas le moindre intérêt, tout comme les autres personnes dans l'assistance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçine düştüğün inin her yanına ağır bir duman çökmüş. Duvarlardaki gölgeler âdeta yaşıyor. Asıl dikkat çekense yılana benzer bir zeno. Soluk benizli, somurtkan bir Drukhari'yle sohbete dalmış, sana bakmıyor bile. Diğerlerinin de pek baktığı söylenemez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The den you have found yourself in is filled with heady smoke, and the walls are lined with living shadows. The centre of attention is a snake-like xenos. He is engaged in conversation with a pale, harried-looking Drukhari and pays you no mind, much like everyone else in here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İçine düştüğün inin her yanına ağır bir duman çökmüş. Duvarlardaki gölgeler âdeta yaşıyor. Asıl dikkat çekense yılana benzer bir zeno. Soluk benizli, somurtkan bir Drukhari'yle sohbete dalmış; sana bakmıyor bile. Diğerlerinin de pek baktığı söylenemez.{/n}
